item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Well I'll definitely be reviewing them as I go. I have a good feeling about them. Let's just hope I don't get my hopes too high. =D
item.content:encoded: Well I’ll definitely be reviewing them as I go. I have a good feeling about them. Let’s just hope I don’t get my hopes too high. =D

item.title: By: Todd Bowlby
item.dc:creator: Todd Bowlby
item.description: I just almost bought the Jump Level Up series used, but they were sadly priced in Euros and had to ship from Germany, so I might as well pick them up from YMI after exchange and shipping. Now I'm really interested in picking them up (anything to keep me moving through this plateau I'm at!), once my Go book budget recovers from the books that only just got here last week.;) I'm looking forward to seeing what you think of them: maybe they take things slow but maybe that's good for someone who just keeps bouncing between 7 and 10 kyu for months at a time?
item.content:encoded: I just almost bought the Jump Level Up series used, but they were sadly priced in Euros and had to ship from Germany, so I might as well pick them up from YMI after exchange and shipping. Now I’m really interested in picking them up (anything to keep me moving through this plateau I’m at!), once my Go book budget recovers from the books that only just got here last week.;) I’m looking forward to seeing what you think of them: maybe they take things slow but maybe that’s good for someone who just keeps bouncing between 7 and 10 kyu for months at a time?
